arts.ttl: Northern Ireland U21 vs. Germany U21 preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Germany U21 will hope to get back to winning ways in a key qualifying fixture for the 2027 Euros.

arts.ttl: Germany duo leave squad ahead of Northern Ireland clash
arts.sum: Noah Atubolu and Kevin Schade have not travelled with the Germany squad for the game against Northern Ireland.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs. Germany: probable teams, latest news, live blog
arts.sum: Germany currently edge a fascinating three-way tussle at the top of FIFA World Cup qualifying Group A, but Monday's visitors to Belfast know they will need to be at their best against a Northern Ireland side in high spirits (kick-off: 20.45CET). Goals from Bayern Munich's in-form Serge Gnabry, Nadiem Amiri of Mainz and Liverpool's Florian Wirtz got Julian Nagelsmann's side up and running in October, while Friday's subsequent 4-0 triumph against Luxembourg helped the four-time world champions go top of a tight section on goal difference.

arts.ttl: Northern Ireland vs. Germany preview: Team news and predicted lineups
arts.sum: Germany will hope to consolidate their lead in Group A with a win in Belfast.

arts.ttl: Michael Oâ€™Neill hits out at Julian Nagelmann ahead of Northern Ireland-Germany re-match in Belfast
arts.sum: Northern Ireland trainer Michael O'Neill has fired a warning shot in Julian Nagelsmann's direction ahead of a Monday World Cup qualifying match in Belfast.
